title: “Sex-specific differences and survival in patients with idiopathic pulmonary arterial hypertension 2008–2016.” Barbro Kjellström, Magnus Nisell, David Kylhammar, Sven-Erik Bartfay, Bodil Ivarsson, Göran Rådegran and Clara Hjalmarsson on behalf of SveFPH and SPAHR.
